Text:
It is so aggravating to me that you guys RAR all of your high-def TV releases! In case you haven't noticed, it does not make ANY noticeable difference in the size when you RAR it into 50MB splits.

In fact, when you archive files into split RARs, it ADDS to the filesize, because of the header info needed to reconstruct it into one big RAR.

So please, STOP RAR'ing your releases. Please.
